doc.description: module for reading pressure sensor data

configure.name: ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_LEFT
configure.description: choose which ADC is used for input airspeed left wing

configure.name: ADC_CHANNEL_PITCH_LEFT
configure.description: choose which ADC is used for input pitch left wing

configure.name: ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_RIGHT
configure.description: choose which ADC is used for input airspeed right wing

makefile.raw:
ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_LEFT ?= ADC_1 ADC_CHANNEL_PITCH_LEFT ?= ADC_2 ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_RIGHT ?= ADC_3
ap.CFLAGS += -DADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_LEFT=$(ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_LEFT) -DUSE_$(ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_LEFT) ap.CFLAGS += -DADC_CHANNEL_PITCH_LEFT=$(ADC_CHANNEL_PITCH_LEFT) -DUSE_$(ADC_CHANNEL_PITCH_LEFT) ap.CFLAGS += -DADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_RIGHT=$(ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_RIGHT) -DUSE_$(ADC_CHANNEL_AIRSPEED_RIGHT) ap.CFLAGS += $(TURB_ADC_FLAGS)
